rows.translation: Perish the hands of the Father of Flame! Perish he!

bismillah.translation: In the name of Allah, Most Gracious, Most Merciful.

rows.arabic: مَآ أَغْنَىٰ عَنْهُ مَالُهُۥ وَمَا كَسَبَ
rows.translation: No profit to him from all his wealth, and all his gains!
rows.transliteration: mā aghnā `anhu māluhu wa mā kasab

rows.translation: Burnt soon will he be in a Fire of Blazing Flame!
His wife shall carry the (crackling) wood - As fuel!-
A twisted rope of palm-leaf fibre round her (own) neck!
